timeline.message: Only log a WARN if the key/value media differ from the global setting

timeline.author: oraNod
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2034,8 +2034,8 @@ CacheConfigurationException storeConfiguredHasBothReadAndWriteOnly(String storeC
    CacheConfigurationException storeLocationRequired(String storeType, String attributeName);
 
    @LogMessage(level = WARN)
-   @Message(value = "Cache '%s' has an unknown encoding for keys or values. " +
-         "Operations that require data conversions may not work as expected, " +
-         "please specify the required MediaType using the 'encoding' element in the cache configuration", id = 599)
+   @Message(value = "Cache '%s' does not have an explicitly defined encoding for keys or values. " +

timeline.message: Reword WARN for absence of encoding
